Project description

python-ldap:

python-ldap provides an object-oriented API to access LDAP directory serversfrom Python programs. Mainly it wraps the OpenLDAP 2.x libs for that purpose.Additionally the package contains modules for other LDAP-related stuff(e.g. processing LDIF, LDAPURLs, LDAPv3 schema, LDAPv3 extended operationsand controls, etc.).
